content:
Your revised social media post looks great! The CTA "Learn more about the outreach committee's projects and how you can get involved" is a perfect way to encourage people to learn more about the outreach committee's work and how they can contribute.

By including a link to the outreach committee's website or social media page, you're making it easy for people to take the next step and learn more about the projects and how to get involved.

Your hashtags are also spot on, using a mix of specific hashtags like #outreachcommittee and #fleamarket, as well as more general hashtags like #volunteer and #makeadifference, to reach a wider audience.

Overall, your post is informative, engaging, and encourages people to take action. I think it will do a great job of promoting the outreach committee's exhibit at the flea market and attracting volunteers.

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, go ahead and post it and start promoting the outreach committee's exhibit!
